name: KidConfident
0:
”Alexa, open kid confident”
”Alexa, start kid confident”
”Alexa, launch kid confident”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kid confident
des:
As a parent myself, I understand that nothing is more important than the well being of your children. 

Everyday, kids are bombarded with messages that are detrimental to their happiness, confidence and self esteem.

I built this simple skill for my son to ensure that he starts every day feeling confident, happy, calm and ready to have the best day he can.

Try it for a while with your kids too and watch as their confidence, self esteem and happiness grows.

This skill itself is very simple. The idea behind it is very powerful. Kids repeat 6 randomly chosen, positive affirmations about themselves. It takes about one minute to complete.

Positive affirmations have an extraordinary effect on children - They help to inspire, motivate, and build confidence and self-esteem.

When kids use positive affirmations from an early age they'll reap a lifetime of benefits.

A really great way to start or end their day!

This skill never collects any personal data.

If you have suggestions to improve the skill, please let me know in the comments.

Thanks and have a great day!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
